name: LiftPoint Consulting
description:
LiftPoint Consulting is a data-driven marketing consulting firm. We help our clients build measurable, long-term customer relationships and revenue streams using data-driven insights and targeted customer communications and services. Our approach is fast, practical and financially-driven.
Driving value from customer-data is customized to the specific needs of our clients and always begins with analysis of key customer behaviors and results in actionable marketing recommendations with meaningful financial (ROI) benefits.
